settings.heading: The KUDU
settings.text:
The Kudu Double Hood Down Jacket is a premium winter outerwear piece designed to provide exceptional
warmth and protection in cold weather. The stand-out feature of this jacket is its innovative double hood
design, which offers unparalleled coverage and insulation for the head and neck. Crafted with a high-quality shiny polyester fabric that is water-repellent, this jacket is built to withstand
harsh winter conditions. The garment incorporates the Respondible Down Standard (RDS), ensuring the
ethical and sustainable sourcing of the premium 90/10 white goose down fill.
The down fill has an impressive 700+ fill power, which translates to exceptional warmth-to-weight ratio.
This jacket is rated to withstand temperatures as low as -25 Celsius (-13 Fahrenheit), making it a reliable
choice for those who brave the elements in extreme cold.

settings.heading: The KUDU Special
settings.text: Introducing the Kudu Special: a premium evolution of our iconic Kudu design. Crafted with a unique blend of advanced fabrics, this heavy outerwear features the same stylish double hood for added warmth and versatility. The Kudu Special is not only designed to withstand harsh weather but also boasts enhanced durability and a luxurious feel.

settings.heading: The KUDU Lite
settings.text:
A lighter, more affordable take on AlphaStyle's iconic Kudu puffer jacket. Crafted with the same attention
to detail and premium materials, the Kudu Lite delivers uncompromising warmth and style at a more acces-
sible price point.
Featuring a signature two-tone mix and dual hood design, the Kudu Lite is a statement piece that effortlessly blends function and fashion. Filled with premium RDS-certified goose down, this lightweight jacket provides complete warmth without the bulk.

settings.subheading: Chic Comfort For The Bold And Stylish
settings.heading: The KUDU Diva
settings.text: Introducing the AlphaStyle Kudu Lite Diva for ladies - a perfect blend of style and comfort! This lighter version features a cropped body length that flatters every figure, making it ideal for layering or wearing alone. Crafted from high-quality materials ensuring you stay cozy and stylish. This jacket available in vibrant shades captures a youthful spirit, where functionality meets a playful aesthetic!
